mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.id,e.name,e.parent_id,e.parent_id_list,e.url,e.type,e.icon,e.remark,e.created_at,e.created_by,e.created_name,e.modified_at,e.modified_by,e.modified_name FROM s_user u, s_user_role r, s_role_menu m, s_menu e WHERE u.id = r.user_id AND r.role_id = m.role_id AND m.menu_id = e.id and u.id =#{id} and u.is_delete=0 and e.is_delete=0 order by order_no
